name: All I Need Is A Shotgun
name_original: All I Need Is A Shotgun
description:
This is a game made for 7DFPS Game Jam.

This is a horde survival game where all of your weapons are shotguns, and you must survive against and unending horde of zombies. As you kill them, random effects will occur.

Controls:KeyboardControllerMoveWASDLeft AnalogueJumpSpaceX (PS) / A (XB) / B (NSW)SprintLeft ShiftL3ShootLeft Mouse ButtonR1 (PS) / RB (XB) / R (NSW)PauseEscStart Known Issues:
  • The game runs like crap
  • Map is too big and empty
Comments On The Game:

It's not as full featured as I would like, but it does serve as a proof of concept of an idea. Ideally there would be more enemy types and things to do and a better sense of progression. Unfortunately I just ran out of time and didn't really plan ahead that well. All part of the learning experience. Check it out anyway if you want though.
